message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $18,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  $18,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only able to pay $12,000 at this time. Would you be willing to consider that?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest and your offer. I understand your budget constraints, however, I know the true value of this product is considerably higher. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $15,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm sticking to my original offer of $12,000. This is my final offer, and I'm ready to walk away if it doesn't work for you.
